WebShop Instruction: i want a on-ear headphone with noise cancelling, and price lower than 180.00 dollars Search

Thought:
I think I should use the search bar to look for a noise-cancelling on-ear headphone within my price range.

Action:
search[on-ear headphone noise cancelling price < 180.00]

Instruction: i want a on-ear headphone with noise cancelling, and price lower than 180.00 dollars Back to Search Page 1 (Total results: 50) Next > B07T3G7L37 DE Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones Decibel H78 Wireless Over Ear Bluetooth Headphones Diamond Studio Active Noise Head Phones Wireless Headset for Work, Travel (Black) $99.99 B08X23WVMD Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Noise Canceling Over-Ear Headphones (Silver) with Sony in-Ear Wireless Headphones (Black) Bundle (2 Items) $348.0 B09C1HY63X Tapela E7 Pro Wireless Active Noise Cancelling Headphones, Over Ear Bluetooth Headphones with Microphone/Deep Bass, Comfortable Protein Ear Cups, 28H Playtime for Travel, Home Office - Titanium Black $39.99 B09C1GQ3KL Tapela E7 Wireless Active Noise Cancelling Headphones, Over Ear Bluetooth Headphones with Microphone, 28H Playtime, Deep Bass, Comfortable Protein Ear Cups, for Travel, Home Office - Titanium Black $29.99 B0892KDXHH Sony WI-1000XM2/B Wireless Noise Cancelling in-Ear Headphones (Black) EX Series Earbud Headset with Mic (Black) Bundle (2 Items) $298.0 B08WZXP336 Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Bluetooth Noise Canceling Over-Ear Headphones (Black) with Sony in-Ear Wireless Headphones Bundle - Portable, Long-Lasting Battery, Quick Charge, (2 Items) $348.0 B09CQ5K5W5 Qisebin E7 Active Noise Cancelling Headphones Bluetooth Wireless Headphones with Microphone Deep Bass Wireless Headphones Over Ear, 30 Hours Playtime, Black $53.84 B09M79MQYD Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Noise Canceling Over-Ear Headphones (Black) with Sony WLA-NS7 Wireless TV Adapter Bundle (2 Items) $406.0 B08GKVKJQJ Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Noise Canceling Over-Ear Headphones (Silver) with Focus 10,000mAh Ultra-Portable LED Display Wireless Quick Charge Battery Bank Bundle (2 Items) $348.0 B08GKWXRF4 Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Noise Canceling Over-Ear Headphones (Black) with Focus 10,000mAh Ultra-Portable LED Display Wireless Quick Charge Battery Bank Bundle (2 Items) $348.0

Thought:
I should click on the 'B07T3G7L37' option since it matches the criteria I'm looking for.

Action:
click[B07T3G7L37]

Instruction: i want a on-ear headphone with noise cancelling, and price lower than 180.00 dollars Back to Search < Prev DE Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones Decibel H78 Wireless Over Ear Bluetooth Headphones Diamond Studio Active Noise Head Phones Wireless Headset for Work, Travel (Black) Price: $99.99 Rating: N.A. Description Features Reviews Buy Now

anomaly_reason: The agent's actions follow a logical sequence based on the user's instructions and the available actions. The agent used the 'search' tool to find a product that meets the specified criteria (noise-cancelling on-ear headphones under $180), then used the 'click' action to select a product and finally to attempt a purchase. The errors listed ('Explicit Retry detected', 'HTTP error code detected') do not provide explicit evidence of the defined anomaly categories, as they could be part of normal web interaction issues and do not directly indicate a problem with the agent's decision-making process.
